ProductInfo.Features:
MOTOROLA I870 NEXTEL FULLY FUNCTIONAL INCLUDES USED BATTERY AND CHARGER.
Included with this phone:  1 used battery 1 used charger   Does not include SIM card.
Phone has been tested and inside screen works perfectly and does not appear to have any scratches
Phone looks exceptionally good - though it has been used previously. Phone shows minimal usage. The item may have some signs of cosmetic wear, but is fully operational and functions as intended.
No warranty expressed or implied on battery or charger.  Batteries & chargers do wear out easily and should be replaced if not working properly. Replacement battery & charger can be ordered through Amazon.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola i870 for Sprint Nextel or Boost Mobile
